div.p: Single forcing trends from CCSM4. Summer SAT trends [1961–2000; °C (40 yr) −1] for ( a) aerosol only ( b) GHG only ( c) Ozone only ( d) Solar only ( e) Black Carbon only ( f) Land only and ( h) Volcanic only forcings from CCSM4. The maps in the figure are generated using the MATLAB software (Version: R2012b (8.0.0.783) & http://www.mathworks.com/products/matlab/?s_tid=srchtitle).
